justification: “participants completed the Risk Propensity Scale (RPS)… to measure their general risk-taking attitude.”

measured_by: SBoption score derived from eye-tracking dwell time/fixation data
justification: “We computed the empirical attentional bias, using SB scores of option… The SB score represents a direct measure of overt attention to a specific element.”
“SBzero_outcome… represented the attentional bias to the zero… outcome… based on the fixation data.”
“SBnon-zero_outcome represented the attentional bias to the non-zero outcome… calculated from dwell time in the areas of interest.”
